name: Perpetuum Mobile (TilWeisheit)
description:
Constantly accelerate! 

Push blocks into the void!

How many blocks can you push down before you fall?

Now with respawning blocks for theoretically endless fun.

One round of this game takes around a minute 

How to play:

You always move forward. 

The longer you play, the more your speed increases. 

Turn left and right with the Arrow Keys, A and D or the left stick of your controller.

Falling off the plattform results in a Game Over.

Try pushing the green blocks off the plattform to gain points.

Green blocks respawn in the air above you after falling off.

Currently there are versions for Windows and Linux (I have only tested on Windows)
